link.script: /* CSS Browser Selector v0.4.0 (Nov 02, 2010) Can apply styles to specific browsers, this js adds a class to body tag based on browser Rafael Lima (http://rafael.adm.br) http://rafael.adm.br/css_browser_selector License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.5/ Contributors: http://rafael.adm.br/css_browser_selector#contributors */ function css_browser_selector(u) { var ua = u.toLowerCase(), is = function (t) { return ua.indexOf(t) > -1 }, g = 'gecko', w = 'webkit', s = 'safari', o = 'opera', m = 'mobile', h = document.documentElement, b = [(!(/opera|webtv/i.test(ua)) && /msie\s(\d)/.test(ua)) ? ('ie ie' + RegExp.$1) : is('firefox/2') ? g + ' ff2' : is('firefox/3.5') ? g + ' ff3 ff3_5' : is('firefox/3.6') ? g + ' ff3 ff3_6' : is('firefox/3') ? g + ' ff3' : is('gecko/') ? g : is('opera') ? o + (/version\/(\d+)/.test(ua) ? ' ' + o + RegExp.$1 : (/opera(\s|\/)(\d+)/.test(ua) ? ' ' + o + RegExp.$2 : '')) : is('konqueror') ? 'konqueror' : is('blackberry') ? m + ' blackberry' : is('android') ? m + ' android' : is('chrome') ? w + ' chrome' : is('iron') ? w + ' iron' : is('applewebkit/') ? w + ' ' + s + (/version\/(\d+)/.test(ua) ? ' ' + s + RegExp.$1 : '') : is('mozilla/') ? g : '', is('j2me') ? m + ' j2me' : is('iphone') ? m + ' iphone' : is('ipod') ? m + ' ipod' : is('ipad') ? m + ' ipad' : is('mac') ? 'mac' : is('darwin') ? 'mac' : is('webtv') ? 'webtv' : is('win') ? 'win' + (is('windows nt 6.0') ? ' vista' : '') : is('freebsd') ? 'freebsd' : (is('x11') || is('linux')) ? 'linux' : '', 'js']; c = b.join(' '); h.className += ' ' + c; return c; }; css_browser_selector(navigator.userAgent);

meta.name: google-site-verification

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

p.span: School is now being conducted on line through the end of the 2019-2020 academic year
Please scroll down for further information

span.p: This afternoon during his press conference, Governor Mike DeWine extended the school closure period for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year for all public, private, and charter schools in Ohio. Our students will not be returning to our school buildings this spring. However, with this information, our South Euclid Lyndhurst District educators will continue to provide remote learning as well as other learning opportunities for our students for the extent of this school closure. Your building principals will continue to provide updates and communications to students and families in the upcoming weeks. I will also provide updates to families as more information is given to school districts from state officials.

On Monday (3/30), during his press conference, Governor Mike DeWine extended the school closure period through Friday, May 1, 2020 for all public, private, and charter schools in Ohio. He also made clear the intent of his administration to continue re-evaluating that date over the next thirty (30) days with further updates forthcoming. With this information, our South Euclid Lyndhurst District educators will continue to provide remote learning opportunities as well as other learning opportunities for our students for the extent of this school closure

div.span: For information on our Free Breakfast & Lunch plans, please click here.

p.span: As a result of Governor DeWine’s statewide action to close schools through April 3rd, our SEL teachers have developed a number of online assignments for our PreK-12 Arcs. You may access the online assignments by clicking here:

This is a reminder there is No School on Monday, March 16th, 2020, for all students. Monday is a regular workday for all employees. Teachers and administration will be finalizing instructional plans by the end of the workday, Monday. The SEL District will provide a link for parents to access their child’s assignments. Click "more" for further details.
